text: Bride with a Dowry () is a 1953 Soviet movie. It was directed by Tatyana Lukashevich and Boris Ravenskih.СВАДЬБА С ПРИДАНЫМ The movie is a comedic musical. It stars Vera Vasilyeva, Vladimir Ushakov, and Vladimir Dorofeyev. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1953 comedy movies Category:1953 musical movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Soviet musical movies Category:Movies directed by Tatyana Lukashevich
title: Bride with a Dowry
